name: Mitsuiro no Yuki
summary:
It is the Autumn of the year 1918.

After the death of his father who was his last remaining blood relative, Yukihiko moves from the country to the imperial capital of Tokyo to live with his father's friend. Unused to the glamour of a European style mansion, it'll take him a while as he tries to get used to it along with the rest of the mansion's inhabitants.
